name: Rice Porridge
instructions: Boil rice in water until soft. Add salt and serve warm.

name: Turmeric Milk
instructions: Warm the milk, add turmeric and honey, mix well, and drink before sleep.

name: Honey Lemon Tea
instructions: Boil water, add honey and lemon juice, mix well, and serve hot.

name: Garlic Soup
instructions: Saute garlic in oil, add broth, season with salt & pepper, and let it simmer for 10 minutes.

name: Ginger Tea
instructions: Boil water with ginger, strain, add honey, and serve warm.

name: Cinnamon Tea
instructions: Boil water with cinnamon, let it steep for 5 minutes, strain, and add honey before serving.

name: Carrot Beet Juice
instructions: Blend carrots and beetroot, strain the juice, add lemon juice, and serve fresh.

name: Fenugreek Water
instructions: Soak fenugreek seeds overnight in water. Drink the water in the morning on an empty stomach.

name: Amla Juice
instructions: Blend amla with water, strain the juice, and add honey before drinking.

name: Tulsi Kadha
instructions: Boil water with tulsi, ginger, and black pepper for 5 minutes. Strain and add honey before serving.

name: Light Khichdi
instructions: Cook rice and moong dal with turmeric in water. Add ghee before serving.

name: Omega-3 Rich Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Drizzle with olive oil and serve fresh.

name: Anti-inflammatory Golden Paste
instructions: Cook turmeric and black pepper in water until thick. Add ghee and store for daily use.

name: Zinc-Rich Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth and serve chilled.

name: Probiotic-Rich Lassi
instructions: Blend curd with water, add cumin powder and salt. Serve chilled.

name: Quinoa Salad
description: A protein-packed salad with fresh veggies.
instructions: Cook quinoa as per package instructions. Chop vegetables and mix with quinoa. Add feta cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Toss well and serve.

name: Avocado Toast
description: A simple yet nutritious breakfast option.
instructions: Toast the bread. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread on toast and top with chili flakes.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: A protein-rich and refreshing breakfast or snack.
instructions: Layer Greek yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass. Drizzle with honey and serve.

name: Oats and Chia Pudding
instructions: Mix oats, chia seeds, almond milk, honey, and vanilla extract in a jar. Refrigerate overnight. Top with fruits and nuts before serving.

name: Grilled Chicken with Steamed Vegetables
instructions: Marinate chicken with olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Grill until cooked. Serve with steamed vegetables.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A quick and healthy veggie-packed dish.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Add ginger-garlic paste and chopped vegetables. Stir-fry for 5 minutes. Add soy sauce and toss well.
